Name: EPS Basic (Unstaged)
checklistText:
<size=21>EPS BASIC (Unstaged)</size>

1.	All EPS cb's - close, except:

Panel 11:
	CB EPS:
		INV 1 - open
		ASC ECA CONT - open

2.	All EPS cb's - close, except:

Panel 16:
	CB EPS:
		ASC ECA CONT - open
		CROSS TIE BUS - open
		CROSS TIE BAL LOADS - open

Panel 14:
3.	EPS:
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - CDR BUS
		INVERTER sw - 2
		LMP BAT 1 & 2 tb - gray
		CDR BAT 3 & 4 tb - gray
		DES BATS tb - gray
		LUNAR BAT tb - bp
		BAT 5 NORMAL LMP FEED tb - bp
		BAT 5 BACK UP CDR FEED tb - bp
		BAT 6 NORMAL CDR FEED tb - bp
		BAT 6 BACK UP LMP FEED tb - bp
